fetch_error: Unable to get data from the data provider. Check your Internet connection or try restarting the app.
data_error: The data is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
content_error: The station data is corrupted and unreadable. Please try again later or select a different station.
settings_error: Nothing to show. Go to App Settings in the App Gallery and select monitoring stations.
location_error: Unable to acquire your current location. Enable Location services and restart the app.
socket_error: Connection error. Get close to your phone and switch the Bluetooth on.
generic_error: Sorry, something went wrong. Try restarting the app.
empty_message: Nothing to show. Go to App Settings and set Track historical data to ON.
